about_the_game:
Unique engine placements, see through nose cones and raw power! Those are just a few of the components that summarize the eastern aircraft, birds rarely seen flying in the west yet special enough to leave a mark in the aviation history. Including the Tupolev Tu-114, the world’s fastest and most powerful commercial prop aircraft, the Airport CEO Beast of the East DLC contains a total of four different aircraft models significant to the eastern aviation history.



The following eastern aircraft models are included in the DLC:

  • Tupolev Tu-104
  • Tupolev Tu-114
  • Antonov An-148
  • Tupolev Tu-154



The eastern aircraft are brought to life in Airport CEO complete with stunning, authentic and accurate graphics and are accompanied by two new eastern airlines. Downloading this DLC will add the eastern aircraft to the new eastern airlines Yuri Air and Сибирские авиалинии (Siberian Airways).

The eastern aircraft can, just like any other aircraft in Airport CEO, be modded with custom liveries using the official MDK.



In order to traffic the eastern aircraft you will need to sign contracts with the eastern airlines Yuri Air and Сибирские авиалинии (Siberian Airways).

Unique engine placements, see through nose cones and raw power! Those are just a few of the components that summarize the eastern aircraft, birds rarely seen flying in the west yet special enough to leave a mark in the aviation history. Including the Tupolev Tu-114, the world’s fastest and most powerful commercial prop aircraft, the Airport CEO Beast of the East DLC contains a total of four different aircraft models significant to the eastern aviation history.



The following eastern aircraft models are included in the DLC:

  • Tupolev Tu-104

The eastern aircraft are brought to life in Airport CEO complete with stunning, authentic and accurate graphics and are accompanied by two new eastern airlines. Downloading this DLC will add the eastern aircraft to the new eastern airlines Yuri Air and Сибирские авиалинии (Siberian Airways).

The eastern aircraft can, just like any other aircraft in Airport CEO, be modded with custom liveries using the official MDK.



In order to traffic the eastern aircraft you will need to sign contracts with the eastern airlines Yuri Air and Сибирские авиалинии (Siberian Airways).

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2,7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any (at least 2 GB dedicated VRAM)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey
  • Processor: Apple M (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any (at least 6 GB dedicated VRAM)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Airport CEO - Beasts of the East

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Airport CEO - Beasts of the East - $4.99

package_groups.title: Buy Airport CEO - Beasts of the East

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz or AMD 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any (at least 2 GB dedicated VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.6 GHz or AMD 3 GHz (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any (at least 6 GB dedicated VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Revive the beasts of the east with these four eastern aircraft!
supported_languages: English, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Dutch, Turkish, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Polish
